shortDescription: It is possible to execute arbitrary commands as root in Terramaster F4-210, F2-210 TOS 4.2.X (4.2.15-2107141517) by sending a specifically crafted input to /tos/index.php?app/del.
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
